courses.name: React
courses.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

courses.name: Angular
courses.description: Angular is a platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript.

courses.name: Vue

courses.name: Svelte
courses.description: Svelte is a new way to build web applications. It's a compiler that takes your declarative components and converts them into efficient JavaScript that surgically updates the DOM.
